description: can adjust typing speed and acquracy for passing each lesson. also use back space for correcting errors
I think this is the best app for ubuntu for touch typing.
If you want to type fast give a try to KTouch!
summary: great software for learning to type fast

description: I cannot change the languaje to English, Spanish or any other than Catala that is useless at all
I really like the app. Sadly the flatpak ist totally broken under wayland in gnome
summary: Great app. But flatpka version is broken

description: Installed the app (flatpak version) but couldn't get past the welcome screen. Asks you to enter your name, but can't type or even click the text box...
summary: Seems good, couldn't get past welcome screen

description: the program looks good, i hope it will work on fedora someday
This seems like it would be a very simple fix, but I can't get past the opening screen where it asks me to enter my name. My name isn't even important. What a waste.

Before trying the app, I was suspicious about whether it would teach COLEMAK as well as the colemak.academy website, but it seems to use a very similar approach. I like the app because it tracks my progress while the colemak.academy website doesn't seem to have that option.
summary: Am using it to learn COLEMAK and it's great so far

description: Can't type the name. It does not launch then.
it doesnt work because I cant write name on welcome window to start.
Out of all touch typing tutor apps I've tried this is by far the best one. Learned to touch type using it, would highly recommend.

Impossible de changer de cours, dans cet version, probablement pas testé, le menu "choose keyboard layout" est absente, il est donc impossible d'utiliser une autre leçons que celle fournit par défaut.
